component.name: createTicket
component.description: Create a new ticket in SupportBee account using the provided Parameters.

component.name: getTicket
component.description: Retrieve details of a ticket identified by the provided ticket ID.

component.name: listTickets
component.description: Retrieve a List of tickets from SupportBee account.

component.name: archiveTicket
component.description: Archive the ticket identified by the ticket ID.

component.name: trashTicket
component.description: Trash the ticket identified by the ticket ID.
